alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 12:52PM EST until January 19 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise affecting Muhlenberg County. .Water levels are falling along the Green River at Paradise. Minor flooding is now occurring, but should end Wednesday. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 380.0 feet, Water rises over the skimmer wall at the TVA fossil plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 380.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will hold nearly steady just above flood stage through Tuesday. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
